title: provide an api for 3rd party apps to control podcasts now that they have a separate app
body: I love to run to podcasts. A lot of apps let you control music, but nonelist podcasts. I reached out to caledos runner developers and they mentioned no API exists for this.

comments.body: yes, to allows 3th party apps pause/resume/control/select podcasts like they can do with default music player or FM radio (wp8.1) would be great
